data.name: CreateDebtAdjustment1
CreateDebtAdjustment2
CreateDebtDetailStatusHistory
CreateObligationTransactionRln
ReadCaseAbsentParentChild
data.value: select top(1) T1.NUMB, T1.STATUS, T2.CSP_NUMBER, T2.TYPE, T2.CASE_ROLE_ID, T2.START_DATE, T2.END_DATE, T3.CSP_NUMBER, T3.TYPE, T3.CASE_ROLE_ID, T3.START_DATE, T3.END_DATE from CKT_CASE T1 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_CASE_ROLE T2 with(readuncommitted) on (T1.NUMB = T2.CAS_NUMBER) and (T2.TYPE = 'AP') and (@cspNumber1 = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (T1.STATUS = 'O') join CKT_CASE_ROLE T3 with(readuncommitted) on (T1.NUMB = T3.CAS_NUMBER) and (T3.TYPE = 'CH') and (@cspNumber2 = T3.CSP_NUMBER) order by T2.END_DATE desc, T3.END_DATE desc

data.name: ReadCaseAssignment
data.value: select top(1) EFFECTIVE_DATE, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, SPD_ID, OFF_ID, OSP_CODE, OSP_DATE, CAS_NO from CKT_ASSIGN_CASE with(readuncommitted) where CAS_NO = @casNo order by EFFECTIVE_DATE desc

data.name: ReadCsePerson1
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCsePerson2
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON with(readuncommitted) where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadDebtDetailDebt
data.value: select top(1) T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OTR_GENERATED_ID, T1.OTY_TYPE, T1.OTR_TYPE, T1.DUE_DT, T1.BAL_DUE_AMT, T1.RETIRED_DT, T1.CVRD_PRD_START_DT, T1.CVD_PRD_END_DT, T1.PRECNVRSN_PGM_CD, T1.LAST_UPDATED_TMST, T1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T2.OB_TRN_AMT, T2.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T2.CPA_SUP_TYPE, T2.LAP_ID from CKT_OB_TRN T2 join CKT_DEBT_DTL T1 on (T2.OTY_TYPE = T1.OTY_TYPE) and (T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.OB_TRN_TYP = T1.OTR_TYPE) and (T2.OB_TRN_ID = T1.OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.CPA_TYPE = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = T1.CSP_NUMBER) join CKT_OB_TRN_RLN T3 on (T2.OTY_TYPE = T3.OTY_TYPE_PRIMARY) and (T2.OB_TRN_TYP = T3.OTR_P_TYPE) and (T2.OB_TRN_ID = T3.OTR_P_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.CPA_TYPE = T3.CPA_P_TYPE) and (T2.CSP_NUMBER = T3.CSP_P_NUMBER) and (T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T3.OBG_P_GENERATED_ID) and (@otyTypeSecondary = T3.OTY_TYPE_SECONDARY) and (@otrType = T3.OTR_TYPE) and (@otrGeneratedId = T3.OTR_GENERATED_ID) and (@cpaType = T3.CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = T3.CSP_NUMBER) and (@obgGeneratedId = T3.OBG_GENERATED_ID)

data.name: ReadDebtDetailStatusHistory1
data.value: select top(1) OB_TRN_STAT_HST_ID, EFFECTIVE_DT, DISCONTINUE_DT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TMST, OTR_TYPE, OTR_ID, CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OBG_ID, OB_TRN_ST_CD, OTY_TYPE, RSN_TXT from CKT_DBT_DT_STS_HIS where (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@otrId = OTR_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE) and (DISCONTINUE_DT = @discontinueDt)

data.name: ReadDebtDetailStatusHistory2
data.value: select top(1) OB_TRN_STAT_HST_ID, EFFECTIVE_DT, DISCONTINUE_DT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TMST, OTR_TYPE, OTR_ID, CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OBG_ID, OB_TRN_ST_CD, OTY_TYPE, RSN_TXT from CKT_DBT_DT_STS_HIS where (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgId = OBG_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@otrId = OTR_ID) and (@otrType = OTR_TYPE) order by CREATED_TMST desc

data.name: ReadLegalAction
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, STANDARD_NO from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION with(readuncommitted) where LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId

data.name: ReadLegalActionPerson
data.value: select top(1) LA_PERSON_ID from CKT_LEGAL_ACT_PERS where LA_PERSON_ID = @laPersonId

data.name: ReadObligationDebtAdjustment
data.value: select T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.OB_ID, T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID, T1.LGA_ID, T1.CREATED_TMST, T1.ORD_TYP_CD, T2.OB_TRN_ID, T2.OB_TRN_TYP, T2.OB_TRN_AMT, T2.DEBT_ADJ_TYP, T2.DEB_ADJ_DT, T2.CREATED_BY, T2.CREATED_TMST, T2.CSP_SUP_NUMBER, T2.CPA_SUP_TYPE, T2.DEBT_ADJ_PROC_DATE, T2.DA_CA_PROC_REQ_IND, T2.REVERSE_CLCTNS_IND from CKT_OBLIGATION T1 join CKT_OB_TRN T2 on (T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID = T2.OTY_TYPE) and (T1.OB_ID = T2.OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (T1.CPA_TYPE = T2.CPA_TYPE) and (T2.CREATED_TMST = @createdTmst1) and (T2.CREATED_BY = 'SWEFBF17') and (T1.CREATED_TMST >= @createdTmst2) order by T1.CREATED_TMST, T1.OB_ID

data.name: ReadObligationTransactionRlnRsn
data.value: select top(1) OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_ID from CKT_OB_TRN_RLN_RSN where OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_ID = 2

data.name: ReadServiceProviderOffice
data.value: select top(1) T1.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, T1.LAST_NAME, T1.FIRST_NAME, T2.OFFICE_ID, T2.NAME, T2.OFF_OFFICE from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER T1 with(readuncommitted), CKT_OFFICE T2 with(readuncommitted) where (T1.SERVICE_PRVDER_ID = @servicePrvderId) and (T2.OFFICE_ID = @officeId)

data.name: UpdateDebtDetail
data.value: update CKT_DEBT_DTL set BAL_DUE_AMT = @balDueAmt, RETIRED_DT = @retiredDt, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy where (OBG_GENERATED_ID = @obgGeneratedId) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (OTR_GENERATED_ID = @otrGeneratedId) and (OTY_TYPE = @otyType) and (OTR_TYPE = @otrType)

data.name: UpdateDebtDetailStatusHistory
data.value: update CKT_DBT_DT_STS_HIS set DISCONTINUE_DT = @discontinueDt, RSN_TXT = @rsnTxt where (OB_TRN_STAT_HST_ID = @obTrnStatHstId) and (OTR_TYPE = @otrType) and (OTR_ID = @otrId) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (OBG_ID = @obgId) and (OB_TRN_ST_CD = @obTrnStCd) and (OTY_TYPE = @otyType)
